items.title: Bosz gaat in op blessure Pepi en aanstelling van extra specialist
items.summary: PSV-trainer Peter Bosz heeft op de persconferentie na de zege op Excelsior gereageerde op de nieuwe blessure van Ricardo Pepi. De spits viel na zijn doelpunt uit met een armblessure en blijkt nu een aantal maanden uit de roulatie te zijn.

items.title: Leverkusen komt vernedering in eerste helft niet meer te boven
items.summary: Zaterdag wordt de Eredivisie weer hervat. Er staan vier wedstrijden op het programma. Daarnaast is er volop voetbal in het buitenland. In deze VI Live blijf je op de hoogte van de belangrijkste verrichtingen in binnen- en buitenland.

items.title: USMNT's Pepi suffers broken arm scoring for PSV
items.summary: United States striker Ricardo Pepi suffered a broken forearm while in action for PSV Eindhoven on Saturday and and is set to be sidelined for two months, the Dutch club has confirmed..

items.title: Sources: Man United aim for boss clarity next week
items.summary: Manchester United are hoping to have clarity on who will lead the team for the rest of the season early next week, sources have told ESPN.

items.title: Sixth-tier Macclesfield stun FA Cup champs Palace
items.summary: Non-league Macclesfield pulled off one of the biggest-ever FA Cup upsets as they knocked out holders Crystal Palace in a remarkable 2-1 win at the third-round stage.

items.title: Salah scores to set up AFCON reunion with Man√©
items.summary: Mohamed Salah scored his fourth goal of the Africa Cup of Nations as Egypt defeated defending champions Ivory Coast 3-2 in Agadir.

items.title: Clock is ticking for Frank at Spurs, with dwindling evidence he deserves extra time
items.summary: After crashing out of the FA Cup vs. Aston Villa, Tottenham coach Thomas Frank's future could soon be hanging by a thread.

items.title: Charlton v Chelsea: FA Cup third round ‚Äì live
items.summary: ‚öΩ Updates from the 8pm GMT kick-off at The Valley ‚öΩ Latest scores | Read Football Daily | Mail Rob 5 min Badiashile gets an early yellow card for pulling down Leaburn, who was in the Chelsea academy until the age of 16. 4 min Campbell‚Äôs low cross from the left is put behind for a corner by Andrey Santos. Bree takes, Jorgensen punches a little unconvincingly but gets away with it. Continue reading...

items.title: NAC houdt stand in ijskoud Groningen bij debuut Andr√© Ayew
items.summary: NAC Breda heeft zaterdag bij de hervatting van de Eredivisie een punt overgehouden aan het uitduel met FC Groningen. Het debuut van Andr√© Ayew was een van de spaarzame hoogtepunten op een bitterkoude zaterdagavond in de Euroborg.

items.title: Primeur Hato zorgt voor succesvol Chelsea-debuut Rosenior
items.summary: Jorrel Hato heeft het nieuwe jaar met een heerlijk gevoel ingeluid. De van Ajax overgekomen verdediger maakte zijn eerste doelpunt voor Chelsea in het FA Cup-duel met Charlton Athletic, onder leiding van nieuwe trainer Liam Rosenior.

items.title: Rosenior wins first game in charge as Chelsea see off Charlton in FA Cup
items.summary: Liam Rosenior won his first game as Chelsea's new head coach, beating Charlton 5-1 in the FA Cup third round.

items.title: Den Uil zag 'verschrikkelijk slecht' Excelsior tegen PSV: 'Wil ik niet meer zien'
items.summary: Ruben den Uil had zaterdag een gezicht als een oorwurm. De trainer van Excelsior had zijn ploeg zojuist met forse cijfers zien verliezen van koploper PSV en daar baalde hij flink van. Ook doelman Stijn van Gassel was niet te spreken over het optreden van zijn ploeg.

items.title: Frank's failing Spurs knocked out of FA Cup by Aston Villa
items.summary: Goals from Emiliano Buendia and Morgan Rogers knock a wasteful Tottenham Hotspur side out of the FA Cup to pile more pressure on manager Thomas Frank.

items.title: Buend√≠a deepens gloom for Frank and Spurs as Aston Villa progress in FA Cup
items.summary: This was Tottenham‚Äôs second defeat to Aston Villa this season and it is becoming increasingly hard to imagine Thomas Frank being in charge when the teams come together a third time in May. A performance that put an end to any realistic chance of a trophy fell well below the expectations of a furious crowd. That their opponents currently offer the diametric opposite of Tottenham‚Äôs dysfunction can only have heightened the sting. Goals from Emi Buend√≠a and Morgan Rogers put this tie to bed for Villa in the first half, Wilson Odobert‚Äôs strike after half-time bringing a closeness to the scoreline that was not reflected in the general play. A scuffle on the field at the final whistle involving Rogers, Jo√£o Palhinha and a host of Tottenham players only added further sourness to the occasion. Continue reading...

items.title: Weston-super-Mare‚Äôs lecturers and builders denied FA Cup glory at Grimsby
items.summary: The romance of the FA Cup in Cleethorpes, ultimately, was limited to a good old-fashioned away following of 571 hardy yet boisterous souls from Weston-super-Mare. The Seagull Army twice wildly celebrated second-half equalisers through Luke Coulson and their predatory striker Louis Britton before Grimsby substitute Kieran Green‚Äôs looping header settled the match and ended Weston‚Äôs stirring six-game run in the competition. Continue reading...

items.title: Pressure builds on Frank as Spurs booed off after FA Cup exit to Villa
items.summary: Tottenham were booed off as pressure continues to build on Thomas Frank following a 2-1 defeat to Aston Villa in the third round of the FA Cup.

items.title: Newcastle win on penalties after epic six-goal thriller
items.summary: Newcastle United and Bournemouth play out a six-goal thriller, after a Harvey Barnes goal in the 118th minute is cancelled out by Marcus Tavernier's equaliser minutes later, with Newcastle progressing on penalties.

items.title: Given apologises for Holocaust remark
items.summary: Former Premier League goalkeeper Shay Given "unreservedly" apologises for describing Wilfried Nancy's short time as Celtic manager as an "absolute Holocaust" on BBC show Final Score.

items.title: 'Humble' Semenyo steals show in FA Cup mauling
items.summary: Antoine Semenyo signed off at Bournemouth in fairytale fashion and makes start to life at Manchester City in a similarly dreamy manner during 10-1 FA Cup win over League One Exeter City.

items.title: Macclesfield realise impossible dream in rise from ashes to a day of historic glory
items.summary: Rob Smethurst‚Äôs resurrection of a troubled but proud club is timely reminder that football can still be the people‚Äôs game From extinction to the impossible dream of becoming the greatest FA Cup giantkillers of all, Macclesfield‚Äôs story reminds that community will forever be football‚Äôs greatest asset. As fans celebrated victory over the holders, Crystal Palace, many took their time to peel away from the stadium. Not too long ago, many feared they may never return to Moss Rose. Macclesfield Town FC, 1874-2020 was the etching on the gravestone of the club that died, mourned quietly by a town that had slowly lost touch with events at the shambling football ground on its southern tip, pretty much the last stop before the long drive to London begins. Continue reading...
